lines.text: Potential changes around circuit sum to zero

secText:
Lesson:
1. Explore [OBJ:actsec_p395:electric circuits] by building an electric circuit.
2. Define and determine the components of an [OBJ:expsec_p365:electric circuit].
3. [OBJ:expsec_p366:Draw] an electric circuit diagram.
4. Define [OBJ:expsec_p367:direct and alternating current].
5. Define [OBJ:expsec_p369:electromotive force] and apply the concept of emf to batteries.
6. Determine if [OBJ:expsec_p370:energy is conserved] in electric circuits.
7. [OBJ:expsec_p371:Define] ammeter, voltmeter, and multimeter.
